name: Leere
description:
Music: loudar

Graphics: Seebass22

Programming: MarioCake

Controls:

  • A -> Left
  • D -> Right
  • W/Space -> Jump
  • R -> Toggle Jump
  • T -> Toggle Small Jump
  • Z -> Toggle Shooting
  • U -> Toggle Slow Running
  • I -> Toggle Boost of Shots
  • Left Click -> Shoot
  • F -> Reset

It is possible to boost yourself with your shots upwards.
